page.title: 07Games We Play
page.content: At school we play padder tennis every summer and we have our own Wimledon competition. We have a handicap but usually the best player wins anyway. We have trophies for the singles and doubles. Every Thursday a mother comes to help the girls with netball and rounders. We sometimes play other schools. On a Monday afternoon a bus takes us to Chester baths and we go with children from Harthill School. Last week we had the Deanery Sports when 18 schools join in different races. I like playing cricket at home with my brother and he plays for a Tattenhall team every weekend in the summer. Every Sunday I play snooker with my uncle. When I have nothing else to do I watch television.I like space programmes and old films.
